website_summaries.verdict: Simple TENS unit that is easy to operate. Includes plenty of massage modes for personalization.
pros: Includes everything you require to start using it immediately
Offers 16 different pre-programmed massage modes to meet your needs
Quickly set the timer to determine the length of operation
Uses a rechargeable battery for 10 hours of power

customer_reviews.title: False advertising. No EMS
customer_reviews.text: Does not provide EMS as described in title. EMS was the reason I purchased the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Blue Screen of Death
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like is the blue screen. It's so bright that I have to wear my eyeglasses with blue light filter. There is no setting to adjust brightness. Check the pictures I uploaded to see for yourself how bright the display is. Recent report states that blue screen can damage your eyes. Hope on the next release of this product you can adjust the brightness of the screen or change screen color. Other than that this product works as intended. The different modes is a cool feature. Easy to operate. The unit turns off after the time set to save battery.
customer_reviews.author: cainpusa

customer_reviews.title: Spend a bit more for a better unit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on previous good reviews. Changed out pads several times thinking they were bad. Not the case. Used for leg and back pain. Could barely feel any impulses turned on the highest setting. I had a different tens unit for more than 10 years. Please don’t make the same mistake I did and buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this unit for 2 weeks to replace my old unit. So far I have not needed to recharge even though I do half hour sessions. Changing the modes takes a little bit of practice. The electrodes it came with are pretty durable and I have not needed to open a new pack yet. The cables are longer than my previous one so I can walk/move around easily. The swelling in my ankle has decreased significantly despite the injury being several years old.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent -
customer_reviews.text: Auvon rechargeable has allowed me awake painless. After 40 years of extreme pain, meds and self treatment I finely tried this great product. Injured while in the line of duty my four back operations has sidelined me from a normal life...however Auvon has provided such great relief that even my somber attitude has disappeared. I have relief from scar tissue, pinched nerves and loss of sleep. My opinion is that you don't have to spend a lot for muscle stimulatiors to get good results. The process is simple once you have done it just once. Thank for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SF-OGG

customer_reviews.title: NOT four electrodes--just two!  Number of settings is a gimmick.  Great battery life!
customer_reviews.text: There are NOT four electrodes as pictured--there are only two. I can't reeeally tell the difference between a lot of the modes (there's six main ones and then different settings within them), so I think that high number is just a sales gimmick. And the pads are extremely sticky (like will leave goop on your body sticky) until you've used them a few times. But I've used this thing for probably a number of hours and haven't charged it once and it still shows a full battery symbol. The battery life is CRAZY good.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, small enough to fit discreetly in you pocket, charges in seconds, and the charge lasts a long time! The only reason I'm giving it a 4 out of 5 is because I don't like not having an option of a constant output and every time you change the setting you have to reset the intensity.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best TENS unit I have ever used. The settings are wonderful. I have a lot of muscles knots in my shoulders and back. I can depend on this each time. I can also vary the speed and the strength along with what option I want (karate chop, glass bottle, acupuncture, etc.). I didn't know this when I ordered it, but it is also rechargeable so I am not constantly buying batteries for it. One of my best purchases on Amazon. As always, read the directions for safety precautions first.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Curl

customer_reviews.title: Wrong device delivered!!!
customer_reviews.text: The wrong item was delivered. Specifically a massager was delivered instead of a TENS device. This error is reported in other comments, so it’s happened before. Very inconvenient!
customer_reviews.author: David R. Fischell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product has really exceeded my expectations ! It might be small but it really packs a punch that stimulates your muscles. I had a pulled muscle in my lower back the day I received this. I used it that night after work and by bed time my back felt so much better and by morning my back was fine. I would recommend this to anyone who ever has muscle pain or stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Not Helpful
customer_reviews.text: During this virus situation I developed sciatica. I am away from home with an ill sister. I left my good tens unit at home, but, I ordered this one. It was not expensive. This unit has weird settings that were intermittent. Suddenly, it would send a really strong jolt and sting badly. It would return to the normal chosen setting when, again, it would suddenly shock the heck out of me. I quit using it. It is small. It is easy to use. It doesn't work as needed. It was defective. It didn't help. I will wait until I get home to my reliable unit that has a sustained setting that actually works and helps. The pads were good.
customer_reviews.author: D Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love it -- it works!
customer_reviews.text: Having suffered from sciatica for a few years, I decided to give TENS a try and it has been a God send. No longer do I wake up during the night with pain or get out of bed in the morning with pain. The AUVON rechargeable TENS is beautifully designed, easy to use and really works. I told my M.D. I was using it and he is sold on TENS treatments and is happy I am using it and he appreciated the feedback. The beauty of this unit is that it is rechargeable -- no batteries to buy.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working while in use!
customer_reviews.text: The TENS unit was feeling alright until the forth time i had it on while using it, it stopped working! The three previous times i just sat in my recliner, the forth laying down. Did all the trouble shooting requirements, just stopped working! Had high stars when looking for a unit, guess not!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to wait.
customer_reviews.text: So I have had this unit for a few days. I wanted to give it a fair review. When I have pads on my lower back and my shoulders. I can't feel both, I have to unplug 1 to feel the other. I like that it is small and portable and the different types of massage. But overall I am not real happy with the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Onehappymom

customer_reviews.title: Small but packs a good punch
customer_reviews.text: I gave this an over all two because I used it often when I first got it for muscle spasm. But had it stored safely and the screen has gone out on it. It has power and easy to use wish I could read the screen and see what to use. So now it's a paper weight. ☆☆UPDATE☆☆ when they ask for reviews they mean it. After months of having this system the screen went almost blank on it. I made a review in regards and customer service started asking questions on it. They quickly addressed the issues and made me a satisfied customer. This little machine can pack a punch where you need it. so give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: EnLHernandez

customer_reviews.title: Licensed Massage Therapist Approved!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I’m a Licensed Massage Therapist so I have some experience with TENS units. This one does NOT disappoint. I do a lot of deep tissue work and can handle deep with on myself and this unit is no joke! I have only been able to get the intensity to 4 out of 10! (If you count the little bars) I’m PUMPED to add this to my self-care regimen!
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Recomended
customer_reviews.text: I bought two one for my dad and me.. really helpful whit the backpain and relaxing
customer_reviews.author: Gka

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use. Has enough power
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Has enough power for me. I have another brand that is not as easy to use, but has more power(too much)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer care!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Auvon TENS unit more than a year ago, and just recently two of the therapy modes stopped working. I contacted Auvon customer service as it was still under a two year warranty. I explained my problem and they sent out a new replacement unit the next day. And my replacement has the two year warranty also. No hassles at all, great service. As for the unit, I use it for lower back and sciatic pain and it gives me adequate relief without the need for pain killers.
customer_reviews.author: David.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, powerful
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very easy to use and very powerful. I have been using it for about a month and the pads are still pretty sticky. I did buy more so I can replace them. I cannot set this above a 3 without it being too strong. I feel that it does help with the pain relief for awhile, but I can't say it is healing up my shoulder problem. I use it on my arthritic thumb and it does help for awhile with that. I know it isn't a cure but was hoping to see some long term improvement. For the price, it is worth it to try it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lockrey

customer_reviews.title: Good tens unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got a car accident recently. I had to see chiropter twice a week. When I'm home, I use the mini one to comfort my pain. Good tens unit for the price. Keeps from having to go to Physical Therapy as often as I had been. I like the fact that its rechargeable and the screen is bright and easy to read. I use this on my neck and shoulders as they tend to get sore with all of my computer use while sitting in my chair.
customer_reviews.author: lucia

customer_reviews.title: Lacks dual channel control.
customer_reviews.text: If the product had dual channel control, it would have been perfect. I have carpal tunnel and patella displacement. The unit sent enough juice for the wrist but it does not distribute enough power to my knee. In other words, my wrist felt better but my knee felt nearly nothing. It is too bad. I decided to return it. But, good news. Auvon does make a dual channel unit. I bought it and found it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: it works great
customer_reviews.text: this little machine in out standing it really works great i don't know how they do it , but it's real powerful it will make you twitch let me tell you , if you ever been to the dr. and they used one like this on you an it worked for you don't go back . for less than your co-payment you can get this little machine for your self an use it when ever you want....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with this device for many reasons. It's effective in relieving muscle pain with many modes of stimulation from gentle to brutal. The internal battery is still at full charge after many uses, it doesn't seem to drain the battery at all. The pad adhesion is effective after many uses and can be cleaned if needed though I haven't had to clean them yet after a dozen or so applications and removals. They still adhere very well. I have the second set of adhesive pads still in their sealed packages and don't anticipate have to use them any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. I have degenerative disc disorder and restless leg syndrome. This helps with both. The pads work well if you rinse with water, they will adhere again. There’s tons of ways to program it, which is fantastic!! This is a great machine, especially for someone starting out.
customer_reviews.author: angechriswalt

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!
customer_reviews.text: This unit has given me real relief for muscle spasms from knee pain. Pain meds don't work well for me so this is like a miracle. I love the little drawstring bag that stores everything. Got this unit because it came with a charger. I'm giving it 4 stars because one of the pads has failed after only 5 days. Update after week 2 This unit great for stopping muscle spasms. Not helpful for bone on bone pain.
customer_reviews.author: C. Karen Tynes

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used many tens units...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many different TENS units and by far this one (for the price) is wonderful. Super slim design can be tucked away in small pocket or bra! Easy to use, never looked at the instructions, and it charged like a dream in two hours. I’m currently useing and found the perfect setting immediately. VERY impressed and delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Patty L. Till

customer_reviews.title: Impressed New product works completely fine Portable, light weight
customer_reviews.text: When I got it and tried to use it at first , one side of pad didn’t work. Tried many ways switching wire, pad .. etc. so I complained it through email , and they sent me New product right away. And they didn’t want to recover the first product I got but apologize that I ve gone through uncomfortable expriences. They listen customer’s voice. Very quick reponding, very kind. Impressed New product works completely fine Portable, light weight, powerful enough, Very satisfying !!!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try it has helped me
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and take along where I go. Not a significant difference in the various settings/Modes. I feel as good as the one I paid $150 from another medical supply first one did not work and second lasted a matter of weeks but not covered under warranty. This at lest than $35 has already lasted longer and provided far more pain relief than the $150one.... Give this a try it has helped me with my pain that I have endured for 12 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Linda5186

customer_reviews.title: Decent unit for the price, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: The only reason in I’m giving it 3 stars total is because it is not durable. I’ve had it for almost a year and only use it as needed, but this morning I needed to use it and it fell out of my pocket and hit the floor and note it will only run if it’s plugged in. I believe the power button broke because it won’t even turn off/on unless I unplug it or plug it in. Up to this point I was very pleased with it. According to the website it has a 1 year warranty, so it should still be covered, but there’s no clear way to submit for a replacement device.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very weak
customer_reviews.text: So the packaging is very nice and the device is well presented. Equipment comes equipped with everything you need. The only problem is how weak the signal is for pain relief. I have had several different tens units in the past and this is by far the weakest. If you need an intense signal this is not the unit. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Old Dutchman

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Extremely compact, but packs a real wallop. 16 modes meant I found several that meet my needs. But there's no way to save favorites, so you have to click many times every use to get what you want. Kit includes two double-sided pad keepers that are the wrong size/shape for the pads it uses. But overall, it's a great value for the price and very portable. I love it! Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B. Scherzinger

customer_reviews.title: Great TENS unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Simple instructions. The unit is smaller than I realized but actually perfect in size. I have had this type of shock treatment for muscles at a doctor's office, so I was aware of the benefits. Easy to apply and remove. Convenient storage pouch. AUVON offers a great little device to relieve pain and assist in muscle recovery. Read the instructions and reviews before deciding which one to purchase as there are a lot of choices.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Baez

customer_reviews.title: Provides great relief
customer_reviews.text: Very effective for back and shoulder pain that I use it for. Only reason I rated with 4 stars overall is it stopped working after a couple of months. Customer service was excellent in quickly replacing the item and I am one happy customer. Wish I hadn't waited so long to purchase this unit. I had never used one before and am so happy I was encouraged by my Doctor to try this method of pain relief because it definitely works.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Family

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I use it to relieve my neck and shoulder pain. Along with a heat pad this little unit really works. Have it for a month now and am very happy with it. Has setting options for type of message and strength.Its very compact, easy to take along.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia V

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Only lastest for about 30 days. Bought new electrode pads and everything and now it no longer works. Very dissapointed because it was working so well at first.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a couple of months now and I have been happily surprised by how well it has performed. Several variations for treatment. I have never been able to use the maximum amount of charge during treatment. As the pads gradually use adhesion, you need to increase voltage on unit to get electrical charge for desired result. Replacement pads are $10 for 20 of them. Rechargeable unit is a great feature. Comes with cable and works the same as charging your phone. Holds charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with how well it performs
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power for a tiny machine that is hardly bigger than a credit card. I do wish there was a setting that was simply a steady vibe rather than those that sort of morph in and out, up and down (hence the 4 stars.) Sometimes a steady unwavering stream would be preferred - I know this is available w some machines. That said, I am very happy with how well it performs. Came with all necessary cables, charging cord, storage bag. It's quite compact - fits in my purse and it very easy to take with me for long days. Happy with this purchase, and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great for muscular backaches!
customer_reviews.text: My lower back was just killing me from walking on crutches and using an achilles boot. My chiropractor used TENS therapy to relieve the pain and get me moving again. However, I still have occasional issues. Sometimes it's just time to turn the mattress. But 10 minutes with the TENS and I'm ready to go! For me, just placing pads on my back above and below the waist line does it. I have not had a need to use it elsewhere. So, for muscular backaches, this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Ravin' Mad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very very happy with this purchase. This is my first TENS unit and I'm amazed how well it works. The battery lasts a really long time and more importantly it doesn't run down while the unit is shut off. I've had it about a month now, use it every night for half an hour or so on various joints, and I literally have only recharged it once. This thing is a little life saver. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: I love this Tens unit. I don’t have much to compare it to since I’ve only ever used one before that was similar to this, but this device is a game changer for me. I love the modes and sub-modes. I think the settings are perfect. The size is convenient and handy. The extra pads are a great perk. This has seriously helped my back tonight and I honestly can’t wait to use it tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie House

customer_reviews.title: Impressive company
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and having cancer I couldn't get it to adjust to a comfortable setting. The company Auvon contacted me about this and were very understanding. They stayed in constant contact with me every day for about 2 weeks trying to work through my issues. They offered my money back. I can not say enough good things about Auvon. They truly care ! I'm impressed with them and would highly recommend them. They stand behind their products
customer_reviews.author: George Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: Great little device. Not too strong on its lowest setting but can be adjusted to a stronger setting in no time. My only complaint is the light is wayyyyyy too bright on the eyes if used at night before bedtime. Cannot adjust light setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relief was almost immediate
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today so I have only used it for about 2 hours. My initial thoughts are WOW, what a relief! I have had terrible pain in my upper back, neck and shoulder, with pain going down my arm. Likely caused by slumping over my computer at my makeshift work from home office thanks to COVID-19. (Kitchen table) In the short time I have used it, so far the difference is amazing. I still have some pain, but much less. I'm sure this will improve even more as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: G Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye aches and pains
customer_reviews.text: Does wonders for my knees, back, and other place that I may feel pain or have had a sprain. I rolled both ankles and had high sprains. An hour a day for 3 days and my ankles were back to full strength. I do advise anybody who purchases this , watch the instructional videos so that you learn to use them properly. It will be a world of difference once you master how to assist in your own recovery.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for size and price.
customer_reviews.text: With a back injury that kept me from working, this little device is unbelievable in its ability to help me through the day. 3 slipped discs and no surgery possible, and I can work a labor job 9 hours a day. I use it daily. Batteries last 2 days plus. Charges fast. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly suprised
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised with this product. My wife bought it for me because tension between my shoulder blades tends to affect my entire arms from shoulder to my hands. With so many settings it was easy to find multiple settings and strengths that were comfortable. It really helps to bring back my grip strength in my hands. Placement is key for this type of product its easy to place it somewhere and use too high a strength and cause discomfort. This thing packs quite a punch, but also starts out on the lowest setting, and has a considerable scale to ramp up from.
customer_reviews.author: Wmc

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: My first time using this was to try to relieve shoulder pain, my pain got worse after use, which I didn't think was possible. I was extremely hesitant to try it again but decided to try it on my lower back where I have this constant bruised feeling that leaves me in a "I've fallen and I can't get up state" at 27. It helped the pain a significant amount. I don't love the feeling of it but do like the results for that particular spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: much nicer than i anticipated
customer_reviews.text: So, i bought this unit to replace a battery-operated unit that i was having problems locating pads for. This unit was about the same money (within $5), and i could not be more pleased! Loads of settings, both in mode of operation, number of leads (2 leads with 4 pads max at a time), and intensity levels which are much higher than the battery-operated unit i had previously. Did i mention that it's rechargeable?
customer_reviews.author: jtinthesouth

customer_reviews.title: Works reliably and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Auvon AS1080 TENS/EMS 7 months ago and it has worked wonderfully. I have spinal degeneration and spinal stenosis and this unit has provided pain relief to me every time I have used it for pain relief. I still have some residual pain due to my overall issues but it controls it to a level where I am more mobile. I have used it for muscle stimulation after finding the charts needed and it has reduced the diameter of my belly. I'm 62 years old and disabled, so that is saying something.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie E McBride

customer_reviews.title: Physical Therapist approved
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist said that I picked a good machine. Better than all the other little ones he'd seen in a long time. It reminds me of the big one he uses.
customer_reviews.author: Author SunflowerJ- @SHJ52111

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an item that I've found to be extremely beneficial for pain management. It took a little time to figure out the settings and adjusting the intensity of the various settings. The adhesive pads worked well. Ensure you remove any oil/moisturizer so that they adhere. It came with a pouch to store it and rhe pads can be washed and reused. I would recommend this item as well as purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cybervixen112

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: After a few days of using it, it will only transfer power to one unit at a time - which means you could only use two pads instead of four. I can't even return it because it's past the 30 days. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for those sore aches and pains
customer_reviews.text: After retirement I didn't know I was going to have so many aches and pains. Dr recommended a muscle simulator/ tens unit. did some research and chose this one because of what you get in the package deal. easy to use and very powerful if need be. Love the fact that it is rechargeable so I don't have to waste more money on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Good little unit
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't go wrong. I've had several tens unit and I really like this one. It's plenty strong enough and has a good amount of settings. I highly suggest it. The company itself has great customer service. My original unit was somewhat defective (it happens), and they were very quick to reply and remedy the problem. In a world where customer service seems lost I got to give them 10 stars, I'm more than satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Es

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I experienced immediate pain relief with first use. I have arthritis in my hip with resulting aches and pains in my hip, leg, knee, etc. as my gait is impacted. I sleep so much better without the ache and throb in my hip which is gone. I use in roughly one hour intervals. The unit is so easy to use and compact which is nice when I travel. What a relief to find a drug-free relief for my pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this NOW...
customer_reviews.text: Stunned at how well this thing works . My wife and I both tried it and jaws were on the ground . Don't over think this it is worth every penny . I am a European mechanic (lots of tight spaces) and get terrible wrist cramps at the end of the day and this device has me without pain after ten minutes on a low setting. I can't believe I went 41 years without one
customer_reviews.author: Roadcomando

customer_reviews.title: This little machine has amazing power. I had a back injury a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: This little machine has amazing power. I had a back injury a couple of months ago and this product helped alleviate the pain. There was an issue with one set of the pads but the company replaced them when this was reported. Their customer service was awesome. There were no cons with any aspects of this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Country Momma

customer_reviews.title: good price for the value
customer_reviews.text: I really like Siri charge action and I could leave it plugged in if it was low on charge. It did not have as much kick as my other device but it was closed. The presets on it are not adjustable other than its intensity where has my medical device I can determine the frequency and the intensity. All in all it's a good device especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Moosetrax

customer_reviews.title: Ready to use right out of the package.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product and brought relief in crucial places. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Douglas

customer_reviews.title: THIS really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact this is easy to use and it helps me, I have shoulder and back pain too. Plus I found it on sale!! This is not saying that it will cure anything but I am really thankful for any relief. I sit all day at work I do get stretch breaks but.. it's hard to stretch at my desk, when you are in a large room full of people... This is great to alleviate any pain.
customer_reviews.author: Baty724

customer_reviews.title: A God-send
customer_reviews.text: I've recommended this to all my friends with aches and pains (which is all my friends). This has helped greatly with various joint pain. Adhesion wears out after a while (reasonable amount of time) but the initial supply comes with extra pads and even more pads can be quickly ordered from company. An excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Szczesniak

customer_reviews.title: I vote yes
customer_reviews.text: I used to relax tense shoulder muscles after a weight lifting session. It did what I needed it to do. I have chronic neck issues which places strain on my shoulders. This relaxed my shoulders/upper back. It also had a zen like effect on my mood. I kept it on for 20-30 minutes as a result. It’s never going to the solve the problem but I love that it takes the edge off.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R

customer_reviews.title: Quality Unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality unit and if the instructions are followed the unit will last a long time and provide some relief for some muscle and tissue pain. Be patient. Relief will depend on the placement, intensity, time and mode of massage used. Try different factors until you find the procedure that will help you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: Pulled a muscle and it was so tight. Purchased this set because it had rechargeable batteries along with extra pads and cary case. Pads are easy to put on and take off. If pads are used a few times, can rinse under water to make sticky again. I used the machine about 2 hours before I felt my muscle loosen. Read instructions and find what works for you. I got 2 more because I got tired of sharing mine with my husband and father.
customer_reviews.author: sc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect luggage tag
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best luggage tag ever. It is flexible so it won't get caught in any situations that will tear it. The identity of the bag is hidden away with a little flap. It is brightly colored so it is easy to spot and best of all it has a cable connecting the tag to the luggage. The cable is definitely the most secure that I've ever used. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Allen

customer_reviews.title: Eases my lower back pain in conjunction with a heating pad
customer_reviews.text: This works just like the ones you use at Physical Therapy. It really eases MY lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Barney Wadley

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Nine months out from back surgery and I am still having pain in my leg. This little TENS unit has made a huge difference! With the TENS on, I can manage a full day at work or at home. It has helped to reduce the pain and get me through the day without feeling like a wet blanket. I am very impressed with the Auvon TENS unit and plan to continue using it as long as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Abels

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think this would be as great, especially because It was so cheap compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a rhythym touch that I paid $250 for at the fair a few years ago, but it was stolen with some luggage so I needed a replacement. I didn't think this would be as great, especially because It was so cheap compared to what I paid for my similar device. Truly though, this product is AMAZING and does everything my other device did. Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Reiko A.

customer_reviews.title: Great compact unit that provides relief
customer_reviews.text: Have had pain in my neck and back for a few months now. Traction neck braces are uncomfortable and balms and creams only last for a short while. This unit has a very intuitive interface and 16 programmable and very distinct massage types. Intensity can be adjusted in very incremental values and the rechargeable battery seems to last for days of use. Absolutely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Serra

customer_reviews.title: Love this  Tens Unit. !!!
customer_reviews.text: I apply ths unit religiously as I do getting dressed ea morning.i use for my cervical and lumbar region. Whether its actually helping my chronic pain due to numerous surgeries caused by degenerative arthritis or purely psychological, I wear it all day long ,but i do take breaks in between. I had a problem with 2nd port not working but Auvon immediately sent me replacement unit. they're great. Not having to replace batteries continuously as in other brands is awesome too. Thanx Auvon.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Really, truly excellent pain relief
customer_reviews.text: This actually relieves pain from herniated discs in my neck & back & does it quickly. Relief from an hour of use in the evening lasts through the next day. I like the long leads & pocket size control unit, making it easy to adjust type & duration of treatment. I can use on 2 different areas (4 separate pads) at the same time, with the same setting for both areas. Recommend VERY highly.
customer_reviews.author: Della McLeslie

customer_reviews.title: Economical and effective
customer_reviews.text: I just got this tens unit yesterday but have used it a few times for muscle knots and pain and I’m very pleased with it. It’s very easy to use, the charging time is short, and the battery life is great! The pads so far seem to be holding up well; take the suggestion from the instructions and put a few drops of water on them before and after use. It feels just like the big fancy one they use in the chiropractor’s office. Hopefully nothing changes but I’ll update my review if that is the case.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my physical therapist for the pinched nerve in my back, and I love it. Once I find the right mode no exaggerating I usually doze off even though it says not to fall asleep with it on, but its so relaxing.l luckily I'm not the only one cause my husband usually does the same thing & doze off too. The only thing is the pads don't stick for too long I only get about 5 uses before it starts to wear off ,but maybe that's just my experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few weeks. Then port where I plug in the pads broke. Poorly constructed. Feels cheap. Also I was not getting equal amounts of current to both sides. Unfortunately I am stuck with this now since I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: anh q vu

customer_reviews.title: This May Be The Answer To Your Pain
customer_reviews.text: I have lived with sciatica pain for the last three years. The pain was so bad I went to have a massage when it first happened, it was too painful, so I haven’t been back since. I Had treatment, it helped some but not much, so my doctor recommended I try this. I started using this in the evenings before going to sleep, it seems as if my pain has lessened & I am now moving around better than in the last three years. Best money I ever spent. Check with your doctor first to see if this could be an option for your muscle or back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, easy setup, works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on a prime day deal. I have some back pain sometimes from working in the garage a lot and this seems to help knock the pain out. The unit came a day early and is packaged very nicely. Comes with an extra set of electrode pads and a pad storage board. It was very easy to set up and very intuitive to use. The seller even contacted me a few days later with some additional tips, which I thought was great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a piece of junk because the packaging was so poor. After using the product I cannot stop raving ...
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived I thought it was probably a piece of junk because the packaging was so poor. After using the product I cannot stop raving about it. I have now purchased 4. Two for my dad for his knees (I got him one and he liked it so much he asked for a second so he can do both knees at one time), one for my brother in law for his back and one for my neck. There are many different settings so you can find one that works best for you. It is powerful and it really works!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: Funny !!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if it is a real pain relief but it is so funny to use, we tried each mode and it is working well. The sensation is funny , it does'nt hurt. It can be surprisingly powerfull if you adjust to high. So, for the price and it is a rechargeable one....perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Cracker

customer_reviews.title: It works for me!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it works for me. My back was hurting and a cousin lent me hers. Surprise...it worked! Bought one for myself and have used it a number of times now. Pain doesn't disappear, but it feels better afterwards. And it feels good using it (kind of like a massage). I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: it's easy to use and helps with the pain
customer_reviews.text: the remote is a little too large. i usually stick it in my bra with the wires running down my back. the different levels of intensity is great. I haven't had it higher than 4 and it really helps the pain. The gel pads sometimes come off when I use the bathroom so I have to wet them a little and stick them back on. Overall it's well worth the money. And I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: Great Little TENS Unit
customer_reviews.text: Lots of mode choices, I like the pads, and that they are reusable (I've used them numerous times and they still work like new). The charge it holds lasts a good amount of time, and the fact that it is rechargable is so much more convenient that having to buy batteries again and again. The size of the unit is super convenient and small, but don't let the size fool you, it has more than enough power to do the job :o)
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Very happy  - but want more information
customer_reviews.text: The backlight is more useful than I would have realized. The only reason I gave it a 4 star instead of 5 is because I can't find, anywhere, what settings are for EMS versus TENS. (EMS is for muscle stimulation and TENS is for nerve stimulation for pain.) In my situation, I need the difference. The charging is GREAT, the ease of use, otherwise is GREAT. Wish it clearly stated which is EMS versus TENS.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you can use it
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the performance of the unit. Unfortunately i damaged a wire. Whereas Auvon sells replacement pads, they don't seem to sell replacement wires. I ordered another brand of shielded wires, but they do not fit, so I can no longer use 4 pads at the same time. Had I known replacement parts were not available, I would likely have purchased a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Schrock

customer_reviews.title: Good product BUT............
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. When I got the product I was surprised by how small it was but it is still very powerful. I would have given it 5 stars but I’ve had this product maybe a month and the sticky pads have already worn out. I don’t know if there are more to buy or if I just have to buy a whole new machine. Be sure to look for extra attachments to buy so your product don’t become a disposable one.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is wonderful. My chiropractor recommended this specific brand and he’s a miracle worker so I didn’t hesitate and the prices are more affordable then at my local pharmacy. It works so good I had another one sent to my father in law to use.
customer_reviews.author: akdavis

customer_reviews.title: Sooo many control options!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo many control options and rechargable. No need to special order bizarre batteries like other devices! Very simple to understand and use. Only used it a couple times so we will see how durable it is. I used it once while my back hurt and it cured it right away.
customer_reviews.author: cub herrington

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it works. Perhaps if I read the manual, I'd know how to switch among the various rhythms. Considering devices like these used to cost a couple hundred bucks, easy, I was suspicious of one for this price, but figured for the price, it was worth perhaps an unintended minor shock. The AUVON works just fine -- indeed, my wife got her own! Be advised we're both very healthy and fit, so if you have health issues, ask your doctor FIRST.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Smallin powerful
customer_reviews.text: I charged it as soon as it arrived and I’ve used it for almost two hours in 2 days and I still have a full battery Several different programs available, exactly like the one that is at the chiropractors office as far as the power goes but much more compact I can just keep it in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: AWEddy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have definitely heard about this through my chiropractor which I had tried out several times in his office. So of course I wanted to try one out but at a much cheaper one. This worked Amazing! And didn’t break The Bank! Highly recommendable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane & Brian

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions before you get kinky
customer_reviews.text: Total game changer after a back injury at my awful employer. Workers comp was useless, but this thing has helped a lot. Just read the instructions before you shock yourself, and if you try to get kinky, REALLY READ THE INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chronic pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: This was already fully charged when I received it. Which was really nice considering the pain I was in. I used it right away and it felt really good and definitely helped reduce the pain. I really like this unit. I haven’t tried all the different options yet, but I would definitely recommend it for those dealing with chronic pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lyteyz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it! Cheaper ones work a lot better.
customer_reviews.text: It sucks and I’m super disappointed. My mom had one off of amazon that was half the price and worked so well that I wanted to get one. Read reviews for a handful of different ones and I ended up getting this one.. ugh. The pads don’t stick, even on the very first use. The settings aren’t great and actually hurt more than anything, like a sharp sting and not a relieving massage. Putting it together and turning it on, simple. Probably the only plus? Disappointed because I’ve been in pain for weeks and was anxiously waiting for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works only for a few months.
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a few months. At first it was great but life happened and I set it aside. A few months went by and I started using it again but it stopped taking a charge and doesn't work on all the wires. Very disappointing. I would recommend paying a few more dollars and finding one that will last more than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schappert

customer_reviews.title: Great unit and great value
customer_reviews.text: This tens machine is easy to use has a nice variety of modes and intensity settings. It's small enough to fit in my pocket and it shuts off by itself after up to one hour. I also like it's rechargable just plug it in using the USB cord. The battery lasts a long time between charges as well. I've had other units but this is my favorite and it's very affordable. It has been the only thing that has gotten rid of the knots I get in the muscle on my shoulder. It's been a huge relief I am sorry but the pain is a lot less than before.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie cleghorn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product works great!
customer_reviews.text: this was my first tens unit. I purchased it to use on an arthritic neck. It was fantastic and enough settings where I found it to be very comfortable. The adhesion was wonderful. I am sure I can use the gel pads several times. It came with multiple pads which is helpful. It's a great little unit and I would definitely purchase this item . The directions are easy to follow as well as the unit. It is not difficult to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Mayo's

customer_reviews.title: Great productbut better yer--great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This unit has just the right amount of power behind it, small in size but features to make it a must-have for those with muscle or nerve pain. The housing isn't as nice as some of the more pricey TENS but the results are great! . The small-sized and lightweight unit is portable. You can even wear it thru out the day --use it when necessary--- the unit is unnoticeable. I like that it relieves pain without taking medication. One of the pads was not working- I contacted the company and I promptly received all four pads free of charge and without hassle--Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: just curious

customer_reviews.title: Only good for massage not building or regaining strength
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have the option to just increase intensity. I needed this option to regain strength in my foot. The unit used at physical therapy has an intensity adjustment. This model is targeted for massaging as it does not have any muscle strengthening settings.
customer_reviews.author: toni s.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have a frozen shoulder and this works to loosen the deeper muscles that feel tight and locked up. It helps relieve pain and keep the muscles pliable. Lots of settings and strengths, and very easy to use. Very glad to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean L.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR PAIN REMOVAL 👍😁
customer_reviews.text: Removes pain from sciatic nerve all the way to ankle! Use with caution, when operation turn up until you feel device remove pain, once achieved set timer for treatment time 1 hr. If needed device turns off automatic! Remove & store for later treatment. Rev. Mike
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Mike Ernst

product_meta.title: AUVON Rechargeable TENS Unit Muscle Stimulator, 3rd Gen 16 Modes TENS Machine with 8pcs 2"x2" Premium Electrode Pads (American Gel) for Pain Relief
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL TENS MACHINE. The AUVON Electric Massager can excite / stimulate the sensory nerves and muscles, activate specific natural pain gate mechanism, relax your body and have pain management anytime you feel the need with our medical grade TENS electrotherapy pulse massager and accessories.

TENS PADS with AMERICAN GEL. The Low impedance Solid Gel has been upgraded to the industry leading American adhesive, which can provide much better self-stick performance and easy clean up after maximum 45 uses for longer lifespan. You may also find it quite easy to find compatible electrodes (2mm pigtail tens unit pads) on the market for you to choose from.

16 CHOICES FOR PAIN RELIEF. AUVON electronic TENS device has as many as 16 user-friendly pre-promgrammed massage modes and adjustable timing, making it much easier to use than other traditional electric therapy products which may need you to set the pulse frequency and duration of each pulse manually. (The 16 sub-mode choices selection is under the 6 massage modes.)

RECHARGEABLE LITHIUM BATTERY. No worries about treatment interruption for dead AA batteries any more! It can give you continuous use up to 10 hours! The power indicator would keep you aware of the remaining battery life (Turn on the unit firstly, then recharge it with the included wall charger; fully-recharged in 1 hour)

What You Receive: 1 x AUVON TENS Muscle Relaxer, 8 x Square Electrode Pads, 2 x Lead Wires (1/2 Wire), 1 x Pads Holder, 1 x USB Cable & Adapter, 1 x Pouch, 1 x Professional User Manual, 1 x Happy Card, our 12-month warranty, and friendly customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
